title: Not Quora
description: A clone of the Q&A site Quora.

title: Image Host
description: A site where you can upload images and create albums

title: My Website
description: You're on it right now! This site is built with Gatsby and React.

title: React Theremin
description: Move your mouse along the screen to produce sound. Based on the [theremin](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theremin), a musicical instrument.

title: Alphabet Soup
description: Letters scattered around the screen arrange themselves to form messages.

title: Not Bitly
description: A url shortener based on bitly.com

title: Conway's Game of Life
description: An implementation of the famous cellular automaton, [Conway's Game of Life](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway%27s_Game_of_Life).

title: Tic tac toe
description: Featuring an unbeatable computer. The AI uses the [minimax algorithm](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimax).

title: Pomodoro timer
description: A timer for users that follow the [pomodoro technique](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pomodoro_Technique).

title: Simon
description: An implementation of the classic memory game [Simon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_(game)).

title: Finger Battle
description: Two player vs game where the faster tapper wins.
